about_the_game:
Embark on a gaming odyssey like no other with ReHash, where every button press is a step closer to speedrunning glory! Brace yourself for an adrenaline-fueled journey through a labyrinth of challenges, where reflexes and precision are your greatest allies.

At the heart of ReHash lies a mesmerizing array of 30 unique buttons, each one a gateway to unlocking the next level of mastery. From the familiar WASD for movement to the dedicated Sprint key (Shift) that unleashes your inner speed demon, every keystroke is a testament to your skill and determination.

But ReHash is more than just a test of button-mashing prowess; it's a symphony of controls that demands finesse and strategy. Every jump, every dodge, every seamless transition between actions is a dance choreographed by your fingertips, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the gaming realm.

As you dive deeper into the immersive world of ReHash, you'll be enveloped by a captivating atmosphere that transcends the screen. The diverse soundtrack, carefully curated to complement your every move, serves as the perfect backdrop to your adrenaline-fueled exploits. From heart-pounding beats to serene melodies, each track enhances the gaming experience, drawing you further into the game's hypnotic embrace.

But don't be fooled by the breakneck pace of ReHash; amidst the chaos lies a surprisingly relaxing rhythm, inviting you to find your flow and conquer each challenge with grace and precision. Whether you're chasing a record-breaking run or simply seeking refuge from the demands of everyday life, ReHash offers an escape like no other.

So, if you're ready to test your mettle in a world unlike any other, where speed and strategy collide in a symphony of controls, then ReHash awaits. Step up to the challenge, and embark on a journey that will push you to your limits and beyond.

name: ReHash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 / Radeon 530
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.6GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030

short_description: In this extraordinary realm, where time itself bends to the will of speed, your agility is the key to survival. Unleash your inner cheetah and sprint through this ephemeral landscape, leaving the constraints of time in your dust.
